title: Rumble Shares Soar on Tether Partnerships , Planned Northern Data Acquisition
contentSnippet: Rumble unveiled three major deals with Tether and Northern Data, expanding its AI infrastructure, ad business and cloud capacity.

title: Trump-Backed World Liberty Financial Token Surges as Senate Moves to End US Government Shutdown
contentSnippet: World Liberty Financial's WLFI token is leading the crypto market rally in a “momentum play" an analyst told Decrypt.

title: A Shot in the Arm: Crypto Daybook Americas
contentSnippet: Your day-ahead look for Nov. 10, 2025

title: Crypto Markets Today: Altcoins Surge as Bitcoin Rebounds to $106.5K on U.S. Dividend Optimism
contentSnippet: Bitcoin steadied above $100,000 after two weeks of losses, while altcoins rallied on expectations that President Trump’s proposed $2,000 tariff dividend could inject retail liquidity into the market.

title: What’s Next for Bitcoin if US Government Shutdown Ends?
contentSnippet: As Bitcoin rallied on the Senate passing an agreement aimed at ending the shutdown, experts see a path to $150K BTC by year-end.

title: Crypto Equities Move Higher Pre-Market, But There’s a Twist
contentSnippet: Bitcoin leads gains above $106,000, yet a CME gap hints at potential short-term volatility.

title: Is This the Indicator That Bitcoin Treasury Companies Have Hit a Bottom?
contentSnippet: Jim Chanos closed his 11-month short on Strategy as multiple to net asset value compressed sharply.

title: Hold Your Horses, BTC Bulls: Bessent Says Trump's Tariff ‘Dividend’ Could Be Tax Cuts
contentSnippet: Indirect measures like tax cuts may not have as much bullish impact as direct checks.

title: Microsoft Deal Supercharges IREN’s AI Ambitions, Canaccord Says
contentSnippet: The broker reiterated its buy rating on the stock while raising its price target to $70 from $42.

title: Filecoin Rises 2%, Support at $2.63 Level Broken
contentSnippet: The token has support at $2.60 and resistance at the $2.93 level.

title: ステーブルコインの正式認可を背景に、通貨の新時代をテーマとした金融カンファレンス「MoneyX（マネーエックス）」開催決定
contentSnippet: MoneyX 2026年2月27日開催、日本円建ステーブルコインの社会実装を議論する次世代金融カンファレンスが発表された。WebX実行委員会主催、JPYC・Progmat・SBI・CoinPost企画運営。参加無料、オフライン限定。

title: Circle, CoreWeave Earnings, Square's Bitcoin Payments: Crypto Week Ahead
contentSnippet: Your look at what's coming in the week starting Nov. 10.

title: メタマスクのガス代とは？初心者向けに仕組みと節約方法をわかりやすく解説
contentSnippet: メタマスクで暗号資産を送金する際に必要な「ガス代」を初心者向けに解説。イーサリアム、Polygon、Solanaなど各ネットワークで必要なトークンの違いや、リアルタイム確認方法、手数料を節約するコツまで図解付きでわかりやすく紹介します。

title: WebX 2025開催記念、ショートフィルム『#ThinkFuture』シリーズを公開
contentSnippet: 未来への問いかけ大型カンファレンス「WebX2025」の開催を記念して制作されたショートフィルム『#ThinkFuture』シリーズが、CoinPostとあたらしい経済が共同運営するYouTubeチャンネル「WebXSTUDIO」で公開され...

title: What’s Next for ETH, XRP, ADA, SOL as Trump Dangles a $2K ‘Tariff Dividend’
contentSnippet: The idea of direct household payments, even hypothetical, revived the same risk-on reflex that drove digital assets during the pandemic-era stimulus rounds.

title: 音楽業界初のIEO「Fanpla」販売結果は申込倍率9倍に　11日にコインチェックで取引開始
contentSnippet: 国内9例目、音楽業界初のIEOとなったFanpla（FPL）の販売結果が発表された。申込倍率は9.06倍、申込総額は90.6億円に達し、28,523口座が参加。11月11日に取引開始予定。

title: 米CFTC代行委員長、レバレッジ付き仮想通貨現物取引の導入を推進
contentSnippet: 米CFTCのファム委員長代行が、レバレッジ付き仮想通貨現物取引を来月にも開始する方向で調整中と確認。CMEやコインベースなど規制取引所と協議を進め、長年禁止されてきたレバレッジ現物取引を「管理」へ移行させる規制上の節目に。

title: 5つのXRP現物ETFが上場準備完了、11月中の米国デビューなるか
contentSnippet: フランクリン・テンプルトンなど大手5社のXRP現物ETFがDTCCに登録完了。11月中の取引開始に向け最終段階、機関投資家の関心高まる。

title: ビットコイン105,500ドルに反発、トランプ給付金案と政府機能回復への期待高まる
contentSnippet: 仮想通貨市場ではビットコインやアルトコイン相場が反発し105,500ドルに。米国で2,000ドルの特別給付案が浮上し、2020年の景気刺激策時のような流動性流入への期待が高まる。政府閉鎖の終息見通しと90億ドルの取引所資金流入も追い風。

title: RWAトークン市場で金（ゴールド）担保型が躍進、機関投資家の関心集まる
contentSnippet: ゴールド価格の上昇を背景に、金担保トークンXAUTの時価総額が30日で39%増の成長を示している。10月にはXAUT専門のトレジャリー企業オーレリオン社が誕生した。

title: 仮想通貨ウォレットのLedger、米国でIPOまたは資金調達を検討＝報道
contentSnippet: ビットコインなど仮想通貨のハードウェアウォレット大手Ledgerが米国でのIPOまたは資金調達を検討。仮想通貨盗難が増加する中、2025年の売上は過去最高を記録している。

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum and XRP Jump as End to US Government Shutdown Appears Imminent
contentSnippet: Bitcoin rose over $106,000 for the first time in almost a week. Ethereum was up more than 7% over the past 24 hours.

title: Next Wave of Stablecoin Boom May Seem Invisible, Says Transak CEO
contentSnippet: Transak co-founder and CEO Sami Start said stablecoin adoption will feel increasingly invisible as they are folded into consumer applications.

title: What is the Fusaka Upgrade? Ethereum’s Biggest Scaling Bet Yet
contentSnippet: The December 2025 upgrade promises to increase Ethereum's data capacity eightfold, adding tougher defenses, and new developer tools.

title: The 5 Hottest AI-Powered Side Hustles That Actually Seem Plausible
contentSnippet: From "faceless" YouTube channels to AI-generated product demos, 2025’s hottest “hour-a-day” hustles promise easy money—but success still takes testing, luck, and a lot of automation.

title: 今週の主要仮想通貨材料まとめ、リップルの770億円調達やジーキャッシュ高騰の背景分析など
contentSnippet: 前週比で振り返る仮想通貨市場の最新動向。ビットコインやイーサリアム、XRP、ソラナなど主要銘柄の騰落率や注目材料を一挙紹介。市場トレンドと関連ニュースを詳しく解説する。

title: The 'Big Short' Guy Just Bet $1.1 Billion Against AI Giants—And Markets Are Still Absorbing It
contentSnippet: Renowned hedge fund manager Michael Burry disclosed massive bearish positions on AI darlings after warning of market bubbles. The CEO of Palantir was not pleased.

title: Bitwise Solana ETF Sees Steady Demand as Bitcoin, Ethereum Funds Shed Assets
contentSnippet: Including seed investments, the fund has generated more than $545 million in net inflows.

title: Cardsmiths' New Currency Cards Include Over $500K in Real Bitcoin, Dogecoin and Ethereum
contentSnippet: You could win a full Bitcoin from a pack of trading cards, thanks to Cardsmiths' latest set of Currency collectibles—with Dogecoin, Ethereum, and Litecoin too.

title: Trump Brothers' American Bitcoin Boosts BTC Holdings to $415 Million–Stock Seesaws
contentSnippet: The Nasdaq-listed BTC miner is now the 25th largest Bitcoin treasury.
